abstract_summ: A survey among all 36 University Pathologies was conducted (return rate 83%) and evaluated; it allows to assess the current situation and shows significant restrictions in the diagnostic and research performance and high willingness to perform Coviid autopsiesCOVID-19, caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 is a new and ongoing infectious disease affecting healthcare systems worldwide.Continued employment of pregnant women related to COVID (Corona Virus Disease) should only be considered if the risk of infection in the workplace is not higher than that of the general population.Physicians in several disciplines, e.g. gynecology, general medicine and internal medicine are equally called upon to be particularly vigilant.Bronchoscopy causes cough and aerosol production and has to be considered a significant risk for the staff to get infected.German University Pathologies are affected by the Corona Pandemics and respective measures.
